plot: When Chris discovers that his roommate, Jeff, is actually a secret agent, he is shanghaied into joining his task force to stop the Swedish mafia from getting their hands on Rhotocromium, a rare supernatural gem.
title: Rhotocromium
plot_es: When Chris discovers that his roommate, Jeff, is actually a secret agent, he is shanghaied into joining his task force to stop the Swedish mafia from getting their hands on Rhotocromium, a rare supernatural gem.
plot_en: When Chris discovers that his roommate, Jeff, is actually a secret agent, he is shanghaied into joining his task force to stop the Swedish mafia from getting their hands on Rhotocromium, a rare supernatural gem.
